1.title: Four Years on Youtube
1.plot: Tom discusses how, after 5 years of being on Youtube he is ready to stop pretending that if he was a dragon it wouldn't be the coolest thing in the world.

2.title: I Am Not in Violation of Copyright Policy
2.plot: Tom discusses how he is not in violation of Youtube's copyright policy.

3.title: This Video Is Not Monetized
3.plot: Tom discusses how, since the video is not monetized he is able to do what ever he wants. Tom from the future appears looking for the lost remote control.

4.title: Youtube's New Layout Feature
4.plot: Tom and Kyle argue over what to watch on TV, when they discover they lost the remote Tom travels back in time to try to find it. In the previous episode Tom runs into himself from the past, but doesn't find the remote. When Tom returns to the present Kyle suggests they use Youtube's new layout feature, Insta-vlog, to discover where the remote is hiding.

5.title: The Multiverse
5.plot: While traveling through alternate dimensions, Kyle meets a cartoon meme, and a dragon. The dragon claims to be an alternate version of Tom from that dimension. Kyle arrives back in his home dimension to argue with Tom about what to watch on TV when they discover they cant find the remote. When looking for it Tom finds the dragon hiding in a desk drawer.

6.title: Dinomy Is Dead
6.plot: Now that they have found the remote, Tom and Kyle continue to argue over what to watch, when Tom from the future comes out of the closet and appears to fall down dead.

7.title: The Journey Begins
7.plot: Before dying, Tom from the future warns present day Tom and Kyle not to chase the dragon because they would lose. To avoid a paradox Tom and Kyle decide to hunt down the Dragon anyway.

8.title: Return to the Multiverse
8.plot: Tom and Kyle travel through a series of alternate realities before arriving in the Land of Forgotten Memes, and are attacked by Cmdr Vogon and her army of cartoon memes.

9.title: The Land of Forgotten Memes
9.plot: After Kyle is wounded by a cartoon meme soldier, Tom sends him away to the previous alternate reality, to spare him. Tom is then captured by the cartoon army and tortured.

10.title: The Plot Thickens
10.plot: Cmdr Vogon discovers Tom and Kyle are allies, and begins to train Tom for defeat the Dragon. Since Tom is an alternate version of a the Dragon from a parallel universe, he is the only one that has a chance of defeating the Dragon.

11.title: The Plot Thickens Even More
11.plot: After Tom sent Kyle back to a previous reality because he was injured, Kyle returns to the Land of Forgotten Memes to find Tom and discovers He has been to this alternate reality before.

12.title: Stalling to Build Tension
12.plot: Tom, Kyle, Cmdr Vogon, and the army of cartoon memes prepare to face the Dragon.

13.title: Facing the Dragon... Finally
13.plot: Tom, Kyle, Cmdr Vogon, and the army of cartoon memes face off against the Dragon. Defeated and near death, Tom travels back in time to warn his past self not to go searching for the Dragon.

14.title: Hero of the Memes
14.plot: Kyle is named, "the Hero of the Memes," and welcomed to stay in the Land of Forgotten memes, however he decides to travel on to see what else he might find.

15.title: Again with the Multiverse
15.plot: Kyle travels through multiple parallel universes before finding a new version of Tom.

16.title: The New Tom
16.plot: Kyle discovers the new version of Tom is exactly the same as the old version in every way, however his universe is moving several years behind Kyle's.

imdb.plot outline: A comedy adventure spoof web mini-series. Tom and his alter ego, Kyle discover that killing alternate versions of yourself form parallel universes can result in attaining super powers, when they travel to an alternate dimension to aid cmdr Vogon and her army of cartoon memes in defeating a Dragon, after Tom travels back in time to warn himself in the past not to hunt down the Dragon, because it's an alternate version of himself form a parallel universe, that cannot be defeated.
imdb.title: Chronicles of the Dragon
plot: A comedy adventure spoof web mini-series. Tom and his alter ego, Kyle discover that killing alternate versions of yourself form parallel universes can result in attaining super powers, when they travel to an alternate dimension to aid cmdr Vogon and her army of cartoon memes in defeating a Dragon, after Tom travels back in time to warn himself in the past not to hunt down the Dragon, because it's an alternate version of himself form a parallel universe, that cannot be defeated.::Anonymous
